availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Campbell Hodge, Sr. (lawyer, Livingston County.)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, lawyer. Married Julia Sarah Scantland Hodge on September 7, 1876. Father of James Campbell Hodge and Robert Scantland Hodge.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, “James Campbell Hodge, Sr. (November 4, 1843-November 14, 1906),” Memorial #73910898, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=73910898 (accessed June 4, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston, Smithland, p. 94.
